page.title: 08SLIPPERY GOWT FARM
page.content: {Slippery Gowt Farm Slippery Gowt Farm is situated near to the{River Witham,}opposite the Boston Corporation Rubbish Tip. It consists of 98 acres which are formed as follows:- 17 acres grass 3 lettuce 24 cereals(winter barley) spring barley spring wheat 18 " cauliflowers 3 " sprouting brocolli 18 " cabbage 10 " winter cauliflower 5 " calabrese The grass is cut for hay and sold to dairy farmers. The vegetables are sold to a shop in{Oxford}and the cereals are sold to millers or for export.
